title: Veteran Macro Investor Dan Tapiero Foresees a Major Crypto Adoption Wave, Says Trillions of Dollars in Traditional Capital Poised to Enter
description: Dan Tapiero, a renowned macro investor, has recently articulated a strong conviction regarding the imminent widespread adoption of cryptocurrency technologies. Tapiero is the Managing Partner and CEO at 10T Holdings, which is a growth equity fund focused on investing in mid-to-late-stage digital asset ecosystem (DAE) companies. title: Bitcoin Transaction Fees Eclipse Ethereum’s Amid Ordinals Frenzy
description: Ordinals, in the context of Bitcoin, refer to a recent development that allows for the inscription of unique, non-fungible data onto individual satoshis, the smallest unit of Bitcoin. This concept transforms these satoshis into one-of-a-kind digital artifacts akin to non-fungible tokens (NFTs) on other blockchain platforms. Each satoshi can be inscribed with content such as […]

title: SEC Charges Kraken With Illegal Operations, Accuses of Mixing Customer and Own Funds
description: SEC Charges Kraken for Operating as an Unregistered Securities Exchange, Broker, Dealer, and Clearing Agency On 20 November 2023, the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) announced that it had formally charged Payward Inc. and Payward Ventures Inc., collectively known as Kraken, for operating their cryptocurrency trading platform without proper registration. The SEC’s complaint, filed […]

title: Why is Binance’s BNB and Bitcoin up today? Bulls be ready
description: Binance’s native crypto, BNB, rose 6.55% to $ 262.73 on reports of prospective settlement discussions between Binance Holdings Ltd. and the US Justice Department. This increase in value, which represents a three-month high, shows market optimism as Binance potentially gets closer to addressing long-standing regulatory issues.  BNB hits a 90-day high According to Bloomberg, Binance ... title: Microsoft’s Stock See Mild Gains After Hiring Former OpenAI CEO Sam Altman
description: Sam Altman is set to join Microsoft after he was unexpectedly fired from OpenAI on Friday.  The CEO of Microsoft Satya Nadella confirmed on Monday that Altman will be joining the tech giant, which also owns a 49% stake in OpenAI, to lead a new advanced AI research team. title: OpenAI Leadership Shakeup: A Reflection on Nonprofit Governance Dynamics
description: In a surprising turn of events, OpenAI’s board of directors has dismissed CEO Sam Altman, citing concerns about his openness with the board. This move, occurring amidst a period of intense scrutiny and growth for the artificial intelligence leader, marks a significant shift in the governance of one of the tech industry’s most influential companies. ...
